title: Watson and Holmes
description: A SOLDIER TIRED OF WARBorn into wealth and privilege, Jenny Watson left her parents' way of life behind when she volunteered to go fight the Shifters. After giving up her commission, she arrives in Linden hoping to make a fresh start and to put her medical degree to good use. But when her friend and fellow passenger is murdered, Jenny finds new purpose working with Detective Sharlotte Holmes.A DETECTIVE ITCHING FOR TROUBLESharlotte Holmes has lived in a three mile radius her entire life, content to pursue her varied interests and wholly unconcerned with the burden the outside world would place on her great intellect. But when Jenny's past comes back to haunt her, Sharlotte may have to choose between staying in her comfort zone and getting answers.EXPERIENCE SHERLOCK HOLMES LIKE NEVER BEFORE
author: E.B. Dawson
